data.title: Urho Konttori on LinkedIn: Breaking News
data.meta_description: Ability to have absolute coordinate system and tracking performance is key in every simulator use case out there. This is crucial collaboration and win-win-win…
data.text:
Strategic business partnerships are a key part of our success. We support display hardware companies such as #Varjo by creating new custom optical motion tracking targets and we work closely with software and middleware developers like #LP-Research so that they can create device drivers for our systems. Here's a great example of both: https://lnkd.in/dUjGDt_8 #AR-tracking, #varjo, #opticaltracking #virtualreality

Varjo Base 4.1 (Beta), intended only for early users of the new Varjo XR-4 Series, is now available for download. This release introduces improvements to inside-out tracking accuracy, passthrough performance, and more. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/dkwZ4x-K

Happy to be a guest on the webcast IT-byrån together with Andrew Dyke from Meta and Sanna Grannas from Avoki, in an insightful discussion on 'devices go human' moderated by Camilla Stark. We talk about how technology is becoming more intuitive and seamless in our everyday lives, and what that means for both individuals and organizations. Of course, both XR and VR technologies as well as the advancements of AI are featured topics in the conversation. #techonology #XR #VR #AI

Video Offers a Glimpse of Vision Pro Hand-tracking & Occlusion Performance A video posted by a Vision Pro developer appears to show the current levels of hand-tracking and occlusion performance that Apple’s new headset is capable of. Apple Vision Pro, expected to launch in the next few months, will use hand-tracking as its... https://lnkd.in/ekmPbNNs #AR #VR #Metaverse

OcuLenz restores the ability to read for people with central vision loss OcuLenz is an high-resolution AR headset that compensates for AMD vision issues to make it easier to read. The post OcuLenz restores the ability to read for people with central vision loss appeared first on MIXED Reality News.... https://lnkd.in/eUWUApxe #AR #VR #Metaverse

𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀: 𝗩𝗮𝗿𝗷𝗼 𝗧𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗕𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗽𝘀 Varjo, a leader in industrial-grade VR/XR solutions, has unveiled Teleport, a groundbreaking service that revolutionizes how we capture and interact with real-world environments. Using just an iPhone Pro or iPad Pro, Teleport enables users to create photorealistic 3D models of any location, transforming them into detailed virtual experiences accessible through VR headsets and web browsers. 𝙆𝙚𝙮 𝙁𝙚𝙖𝙩𝙪𝙧𝙚𝙨: - 𝘌𝘧𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘭𝘦𝘴𝘴 3𝘋 𝘚𝘤𝘢𝘯𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨: Capture high-resolution scans of environments with intuitive iOS apps, soon expanding to Android devices. - 𝘗𝘩𝘰𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘤 𝘋𝘦𝘵𝘢𝘪𝘭: Advanced machine learning ensures accurate lighting, shading, and textures, creating stunning digital twins of real-world places. - 𝘉𝘳𝘰𝘢𝘥 𝘈𝘤𝘤𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘣𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘵𝘺: Explore captures on Varjo headsets, other OpenXR-compatible VR headsets, or directly in your browser. - 𝘋𝘪𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘴𝘦 𝘈𝘱𝘱𝘭𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘴: Ideal for remote collaboration, virtual tourism, industrial planning, and more, Teleport bridges the gap between physical and virtual worlds. 𝙄𝙣𝙨𝙥𝙞𝙧𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙄𝙣𝙣𝙤𝙫𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣: Varjo Teleport is set to redefine spatial computing, making immersive, high-fidelity virtual environments more accessible and efficient. Whether for professional use or personal exploration, Teleport opens new possibilities for experiencing and interacting with our world in unprecedented ways. #VarjoTeleport #SpatialComputing #VirtualReality #XR #Innovation #FutureOfWork #DigitalTwin #TechRevolution #ImmersiveExperience 𝙑𝙞𝙙𝙚𝙤 𝘾𝙧𝙚𝙙𝙞𝙩𝙨: Varjo

Making cool visualizations isn't where the innovation lies... I've seen many an experimental prototype of dataviz in XR... but turning it into a PRODUCT with a full enterprise workflow: that is what makes it REAL. Using the Lenovo VRX and Qualcomm Snapdragon Spaces, I walk through the enterprise workflow using the Flow platform: the no-code Flow Editor, the back-end on-prem server, and the dataset API. #snapdragonspaces #vrx #lenovo #flowimmersive #datavisualization #ar

- FUTURE IS NOW : AR LAPTOP Step into the future with the AR Laptop! 🚀 ✨ Experience augmented reality that transforms the way you work, play, and create. See your projects come to life in ways you never imagined. The future of technology is here. Are you ready to embrace it? 🌟💻 #ARLaptop #TechRevolution #AugmentedReality #FutureIsNow #InnovativeTech #NextGenLaptop

"The crisp screen is striking—in mixed-reality mode, you can easily read even small text, as on a receipt. It’s clear enough to make you feel like you have superhuman vision." Learn what Robb Report had to say about the Varjo XR-4 in this review: https://lnkd.in/dKkAwtfX
